channel.title: Solanum Tuberosum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Solanum Tuberosum on funPlantGenes

item.title: BRC1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400004054 Gene Symbol: BRC1b Gene Name: BRANCHED1b Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Description: We show that BRANCHED1b (BRC1b) acts as a tuberization repressor in aerial axillary buds, which prevents buds from competing in sink strength with stolons.

item.title: ScAREB4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.11G016910 Gene Symbol: ScAREB4 Gene Name: ABA-responsive element binding protein 4 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: ScAREB4 promotes potato constitutive and acclimated freezing tolerance associated with enhancing trehalose synthesis and oxidative stress tolerance.

item.title: SN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SN1 Gene Name: Snakin-1 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Snakin-1 (SN1), a cysteine-rich peptide with broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity in vitro, was evaluated for its ability to confer resistance to pathogens in transgenic potatoes.

item.title: StABF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StABF1 Gene Name: ABRE binding factor1 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Characterization of StABF1, a stress-responsive bZIP transcription factor from Solanum tuberosum L.

item.title: StABL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.10G025990.1 Gene Symbol: StABL1 Gene Name: bZIP transcription factors StABI5-like 1 Genome: Spud DB (http://spuddb.

item.title: StAmy23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400009891 Gene Symbol: StAmy23 Gene Name: alpha-amylase 23 Genome: potato genome sequence consortium database (http://solanaceae.

item.title: StAN11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StAN11 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StAN11, a WD40-repeat gene, was cloned from potato cultivar Chieftain (Solanum tuberosum L.

item.title: StAST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.06G026030.1 Gene Symbol: StAST1 Gene Name: TCP protein 1 Genome: Spud DB (http://spuddb.

item.title: StBAM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400001549 Gene Symbol: StBAM1 Gene Name: Genome: potato genome sequence consortium database (http://solanaceae.

item.title: StBAM9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400010664 Gene Symbol: StBAM9 Gene Name: Genome: potato genome sequence consortium database (http://solanaceae.

item.title: StBEL5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StBEL5 Gene Name: BEL1-related homeotic protein 5 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The level of StBEL5 mRNA increased in response to a short-day photoperiod in both leaves and stolons.

item.title: StbHLH93
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StbHLH93 Gene Name: transcription factor bHLH93-like Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: We identified a novel tuber-specific basic helix–loop–helix (bHLH) transcription factor, StbHLH93, based on the high-resolution transcriptome of potato tuber development.

item.title: StBIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.03G001350.2 Gene Symbol: StBIN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StSN2 interacts with the brassinosteroid signaling suppressor StBIN2 to maintain tuber dormancy.

item.title: StBRI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMT400050728 Gene Symbol: StBRI1 Gene Name: BRASSINOSTEROID-INSENSITIVE 1 Genome: Spud DB Potato Genomics Resource data libraries Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The brassinosteroid receptor StBRI1 promotes tuber development by enhancing plasma membrane H+-ATPase activity in potato.

item.title: StbZIP61
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StbZIP61 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The potato transcription factor StbZIP61 regulates dynamic biosynthesis of salicylic acid in defense against Phytophthora infestans infection.

item.title: StCBL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.06G013800.1 Gene Symbol: StCBL3 Gene Name: Calcineurin B-Like protein 3 Genome: Spud DB (http://spuddb.

item.title: StCDPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StCDPK3 Gene Name: calcium dependent protein kinase3 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The novel Solanum tuberosum calcium dependent protein kinase, StCDPK3, is expressed in actively growing organs.

item.title: StERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StERF3 Gene Name: ERF-associated amphiphilic repression Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The Potato ERF Transcription Factor StERF3 Negatively Regulates Resistance to Phytophthora infestans and Salt Tolerance in Potato.

item.title: StEXA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.04G035210 Gene Symbol: StEXA1 Gene Name: Essential for potexvirus Accumulation 1 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Susceptibility factor StEXA1 interacts with StnCBP to facilitate potato virus Y accumulation through the stress granule-dependent RNA regulatory pathway in potato.

item.title: StGA20ox1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.03G016400.1 Gene Symbol: StGA20ox1 Gene Name: Genome: Spud DB (http://spuddb.

item.title: StGA2ox1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StGA2ox1 Gene Name: Gibberellin 2-oxidase 1 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StGA2ox1 is induced prior to stolon swelling and controls GA levels during potato tuber development.

item.title: StInvInh2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StInvInh2A Gene Name: Shepody putative invertase inhibitor Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StInvInh2 as an inhibitor of StvacINV1 regulates the cold-induced sweetening of potato tubers by specifically capping vacuolar invertase activity.

item.title: StInvInh2B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StInvInh2B Gene Name: ND860-2 putative invertase inhibitor Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StInvInh2 as an inhibitor of StvacINV1 regulates the cold-induced sweetening of potato tubers by specifically capping vacuolar invertase activity.

item.title: StIPP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400016891 Gene Symbol: StIPP Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Description: In Arabidopsis protoplasts, expression of StIPP resulted in the stabilization of the PAMP receptor, FLAGELLIN-SENSITIVE 2, indicating that StIPP may act as a PAMP-induced and localized antagonist of PtdIns(4,5)P2-dependent processes during plant immunity.

item.title: StJAZ1-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.07G012950.1 Gene Symbol: StJAZ1-like Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of StJAZ1-like affects tuber initiation and yield in potato.

item.title: StKCS6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StKCS6 Gene Name: 3-ketoacyl-CoA synthase 6 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Silencing of StKCS6 in potato periderm leads to reduced chain lengths of suberin and wax compounds and increased peridermal transpiration.

item.title: StLRPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StLRPK1 Gene Name: LRR receptor-like kinase 1 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: A potato STRUBBELIG-RECEPTOR FAMILY member, StLRPK1, associates with StSERK3A/BAK1 and activates immunity.

item.title: StLTP10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StLTP10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Silencing of StLTP10 results in reduced resistance to P.

item.title: StLTP6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StLTP6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Potato (Solanum tuberosum L.

item.title: StMKK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sotub12g010200.1.1 Gene Symbol: StMKK1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Found that StMKK1 negatively regulated potato resistance to the hemibiotrophic/biotrophic pathogens P.

item.title: StMKK5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sotub03g022560 Gene Symbol: StMKK5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The potato StMKK5-StSIPK module enhances resistance to Phytophthora pathogens through activating the salicylic acid and ethylene signalling pathways.

item.title: StMLP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.06G027430.1 Gene Symbol: StMLP1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMLP1, as a Kunitz trypsin inhibitor, enhances potato resistance and specifically expresses in vascular bundles during Ralstonia solanacearum infection.

item.title: StMPK7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMP400021542 Gene Symbol: StMPK7 Gene Name: Soltu.

item.title: StMYB144
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.Atl_v3.07_1G012240.1 Gene Symbol: StMYB144 Gene Name: myeloblastosis transcription factor 144 Genome: Annotation (v3) for the Phased Assembly of Atlantic Tetraploid Potato Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMYB24, StMYB144, and StMYB168 positively regulate suberin biosynthesis at potato tuber wounds during healing.

item.title: StMYB168
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.Atl_v3.09_2G018520.1 Gene Symbol: StMYB168 Gene Name: myeloblastosis transcription factor 168 Genome: Annotation (v3) for the Phased Assembly of Atlantic Tetraploid Potato Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMYB24, StMYB144, and StMYB168 positively regulate suberin biosynthesis at potato tuber wounds during healing.

item.title: StMYB24
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.Atl_v3.02_4G016430.1 Gene Symbol: StMYB24 Gene Name: myeloblastosis transcription factor 24 Genome: Annotation (v3) for the Phased Assembly of Atlantic Tetraploid Potato Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMYB24, StMYB144, and StMYB168 positively regulate suberin biosynthesis at potato tuber wounds during healing.

item.title: StMYB44-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400003316 Gene Symbol: StMYB44-1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMYB44 negatively regulates anthocyanin biosynthesis at high temperatures in tuber flesh of potato.

item.title: StMYB44-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400007994 Gene Symbol: StMYB44-2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMYB44 negatively regulates anthocyanin biosynthesis at high temperatures in tuber flesh of potato.

item.title: StNAC103
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StNAC103 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 103 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Silencing of the potato StNAC103 gene enhances the accumulation of suberin polyester and associated wax in tuber skin.

item.title: StNPR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG401000923 Gene Symbol: StNPR3 Gene Name: non-expressor of pathogenesis-related protein 3 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: genome editing of StNPR3 confers potato resistance to CLso by activating SA-mediated defences and JA catabolism.

item.title: StPBS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StPBS1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Decoy engineering of the receptor-like cytoplasmic kinase StPBS1 to defend against virus infection in potato.

item.title: StPIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400014879 Gene Symbol: StPIP1 Gene Name: Genome: Spud DB (http://solanaceae.

item.title: StPP2Ac2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StPP2Ac2b Gene Name: protein phosphatase 2A catalytic subunit Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The protein phosphatase 2A catalytic subunit StPP2Ac2b is involved in the control of potato tuber sprouting and source–sink balance in tubers and sprouts.

item.title: StPPI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StPPI1 Gene Name: proton pump interactor 1 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Characterization of StPPI1, a proton pump interactor from Solanum tuberosum L.

item.title: StPTP1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMC400045325 Gene Symbol: StPTP1a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Description: StPTP1a negatively regulates potato immunity and represses SA-related gene expression.

item.title: StSN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.01G050660.1 Gene Symbol: StSN2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StSN2 interacts with the brassinosteroid signaling suppressor StBIN2 to maintain tuber dormancy.

item.title: StSP6A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMT400060057 Gene Symbol: StSP6A Gene Name: SELF-PRUNING 6A Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The tuberization signal StSP6A represses flower bud development in potato.

item.title: StSP6A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.05G026370.1 Gene Symbol: StSP6A Gene Name: Genome: Spud DB (http://spuddb.

item.title: StSP6A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StSP6A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Description: The direct physical interaction between StSWEET11 and StSP6A proteins represents a link between the sugar and photoperiodic pathways for the regulation of potato tuber formation.

item.title: StSWEET11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StSWEET11 Gene Name: Genome: Potato Genome Sequencing Consortium website (http://www.

item.title: StTINY3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.03G035540.1 Gene Symbol: StTINY3 Gene Name: CBF/DREB transcription factor3 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor StTINY3 enhances cold-induced sweetening resistance by coordinating starch resynthesis and sucrose hydrolysis in potato.

item.title: StTOPP6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.05G025610.1 Gene Symbol: StTOPP6 Gene Name: type one protein phosphatase 6 Genome: Group Phureja DM 1-3 516 R44 (v.

item.title: StTST3.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.02G022370.1 Gene Symbol: StTST3.1 Gene Name: TST3-type isoform Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of the tonoplast sugar transporter, StTST3.

item.title: StTST3.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.03G003220.1 Gene Symbol: StTST3.2 Gene Name: TST3-type isoform Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of the tonoplast sugar transporter StTST3.

item.title: StUBA2a/b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.01G005860.9 Gene Symbol: StUBA2a/b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMPK7 phosphorylates and stabilizes a potato RNA-binding protein StUBA2a/b to enhance plant defence responses.

item.title: StWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY DNA binding protein 1 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor StWRKY1 regulates phenylpropanoid metabolites conferring late blight resistance in potato.

item.title: StWUS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.02G023940.1 Gene Symbol: StWUS Gene Name: WUSCHEL Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: WUSCHEL (StWUS) controls genotype-dependent shoot regeneration capacity in potato.
